channel.title: Gfx direction?
channel.description: how can i change the direction that a gfx is facing according to where the player is facing? For example, when i use [code]staticAnimation(24, absX, absY, 100);[/code] to show a rune arrow being pulled back, it always faces south. How do i get it to face the direction of the player? [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img74.imageshack.us/img74/7132/bugzmb6.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Gfx direction?
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“i_own__u, post:9, topic:127641”]createProjectile(int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int gfxMoving, int startHeight, int endHeight, int lockon)

There you go :o[/quote] yes. but how would i get the gfx to stay on top of the player? i tried things like changing to lockon to playerId, but it still went to the enemy…

Read full topic

item.title: Gfx direction?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

createProjectile(int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int gfxMoving, int startHeight, int endHeight, int lockon)

There you go :o

item.title: Gfx direction?
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:7, topic:127641”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=178270.msg1633247#msg1633247 date=1185624933]
you can’t bump and i’m gonna say it again i don’t think u can edit the way the gfx faces
[/quote]
Yes it is possibly to edit the way the gfx faces, otherwise all gfx would face the same way. I’m still trying to figure it out myself though.[/quote] ok. i figured out how to get a gfx to face the direction of the player. you can use playerGfx. public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) { mask100var1 = id; mask100var2 = delay; mask100update = true; updateRequired = true; }. the only problem is that the height of the gfx is at floor level… does anyone know how to change the heightlevel?

Read full topic

item.title: Gfx direction?

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

dragonus18:

you can’t bump and i’m gonna say it again i don’t think u can edit the way the gfx faces

Yes it is possibly to edit the way the gfx faces, otherwise all gfx would face the same way. I’m still trying to figure it out myself though.

item.description:

I tried using createprojectile, but i can’t get the gfx to stay still… Help please.
